Reference Methods

==Connection handling==
  * Redis __construct()
  * boolean connect(string host, int port)
  * string ping()
  * void close()

==Commands operating on string values==
  * boolean set(string key, string value)
  * string get(string key)
  * boolean add(string key, string value)
  * boolean incr(string key, int value = 1)
  * boolean decr(string key, int value = 1)

==Commands operating on the key space==
  * boolean exists(string key)
  * int type(string key)
  * array getKeys(string pattern)
  * boolean delete(string key)

==Commands operating on list objects==
  * boolean listPush(string key, string value, int type = 0)
  * string listPop(string key, int type = 0)
  * int listSize(string key)
  * boolean listTrim(string key, int start, int end)
  * string listGet(string key, int index)
  * array listGetRange(string key, int start, int end)

==Commands operating on set objects==
  * boolean setAdd(string key, string member)
  * int setSize(string key)
  * mixed setRemove(string key, string member)
  * boolean setContains(string key, string member)
  * array setGetMembers(string key)
